document_data.name: Vanishing Hills
document_data.mainbody: The '''Vanishing Hills''' were a grouping of hills located along the northern coast of the [[Moonsea]] region of [[North Faerûn]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|56}}

Geography.Geographical Features: The hills were the source of the [[Trank River]], which ran south and opened up into the [[Twilight Marsh]] and the actual [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]].
